about_the_game:
Get a classic and take it to a whole new level of style and power. Here is the philosophy that drives the Hot Rods—street monsters with super-sized engines that literally can't fit in the car body! An excess of power ready to be unleashed on the track to whizz at full speed and leave everything behind you. Especially your opponents!
In the Rust and Fast Pack you will find nothing less than two legends like Mod Rod and the futuristic FusionBusta™. Mod Rod combines a classic look with modern details, combining the best of both worlds for a result that is all style and energy, with its signature all-round windows that makes it even more badass. And when modern isn't enough, get behind the wheel of the futuristic FusionBusta™ and its super-powered engine, that takes the hot rods towards new horizons of evolution!

This DLC includes:
  • Mod Rod
  • FusionBusta™

This DLC is not included in any Season Pass.

In the Rust and Fast Pack you will find nothing less than two legends like Mod Rod and the futuristic FusionBusta™. Mod Rod combines a classic look with modern details, combining the best of both worlds for a result that is all style and energy, with its signature all-round windows that makes it even more badass. And when modern isn't enough, get behind the wheel of the futuristic FusionBusta™ and its super-powered engine, that takes the hot rods towards new horizons of evolution!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent / AMD FX-4350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900k or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 Super / Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Get a classic and take it to a whole new level of style and power. Here is the philosophy of the Hot Rods! Unleash the strength of Mod Rod and the futuristic combativeness of FusionBusta™ onto the track. With their superpowered engines you will leave them all behind!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
